    • Constructor Detail

      • INDIArduinoDriver

        public INDIArduinoDriver​(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                         java.io.OutputStream outputStream,
                         boolean connectImmediately)
        Class constructor. Initializes the INDI properties and elements and looks for available serial ports.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - an input stream from which this driver will retrieve the messages from the server.
        outputStream - an output stream to which this driver will send messages to the server.
        connectImmediately - if true the driver will attempt to connect to the default serial port immediately.

      • INDIArduinoDriver

    • Method Detail

      • forceReboot

        public void forceReboot()
        Forces the board to restart and cleans all the pins' values. Attention: may reset the focuser status!

      • getName

        Returns the name of the driver

      • processNewNumberValue

        public void processNewNumberValue​(laazotea.indi.driver.INDINumberProperty property,
                                  java.util.Date timestamp,
                                  laazotea.indi.driver.INDINumberElementAndValue[] elementsAndValues)
        Description copied from class: laazotea.indi.driver.INDIDriver
        Called when a new Number Vector message has been received from a Client. Must be implemented in Drivers to take care of the new values sent by clients. It will be called with correct Properties and Elements. Any incorrect Number Message received will be discarded and this method will not be called.
        Specified by:
        processNewNumberValue in class laazotea.indi.driver.INDIDriver
        Parameters:
        property - The Number Property asked to change.
        timestamp - The timestamp of the received message
        elementsAndValues - An array of pairs of Number Elements and its requested values to be parsed.
